full_text:
Incident Report
CHEROKEE COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE
498 CHATTIN DRIVE
(678) 493-4200
J6-6702 DRAFT
Reported Date: 01/21/2006
Officer: ALLEN, AUTUMN
Administrative Information
Agency: CHEROKEE COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE
Report No: 06-6702
Supplement No: 0001
Reported Date: 01/21/2006
Reported Time: 15:30
Assignment: CID DAY SHIFT PERSONS UNIT
CID DAY SHIFT PERSONS UNIT
Narrative
On 012106 I was notified by dispatch to give B-43 a call. I called and spoke with D/S Ballard and he was taking a report of a missing juvenile age 15. He stated she was supposed to have gone to a basketball game last night but she didn't. He stated she went off with some black males. He told they were stopped by some white friends of her and they fought with the black males. D/S Ballard said the mother had contact with her daughter around 8:00 last night but had not heard from her since then.
Report Officer: 000284/ALLEN, AUTUMN
Printed At: 06/06/2006 11:12
Page 1 of 1
07/26/17 Page 52 of 95 Public Records Request No.: 17-295

He stated she was supposed to have gone to a basketball game last night but she didn't. He stated she went off with some black males.
